SEARCH
Package gui.swingWorkers

Class PingTask

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.SwingWorker<Void,Integer>
gui.swingWorkers.PingTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, Future<Void>, RunnableFuture<Void>
public class PingTask extends SwingWorker<Void,Integer>
PingTask is a SwingWorker that performs a ping operation in the background. It updates a progress bar and a text area with the results of the ping operation.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • PingTask

      public PingTask(String ipAddress, int pingCount, JProgressBar progressBar, JTextArea outputArea)
      Constructs a new PingTask.
      Parameters:
      ipAddress - the IP address to ping
      pingCount - the number of ping requests to send
      progressBar - the progress bar to update with the progress of the ping operation
      outputArea - the text area to update with the results of the ping operation

  • Method Details

    • doInBackground

      protected Void doInBackground() throws Exception
      Executes the ping command in the background. Reads the output of the ping command and updates the progress bar and text area.
      Specified by:
      doInBackground in class SwingWorker<Void,Integer>
      Returns:
      null
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the execution of the ping command

    • process

      protected void process(List<Integer> chunks)
      Processes the published progress values and updates the progress bar.
      Overrides:
      process in class SwingWorker<Void,Integer>
      Parameters:
      chunks - the list of progress values to process

    • done

      protected void done()
      Called when the background task is done. Sets the progress bar to 100%.
      Overrides:
      done in class SwingWorker<Void,Integer>
